trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_SEQ_00<tab>Jantellot will not stop moaning about his leg.

TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_SEQ_01<tab>Jantellot tells you that, despite his remarkable combat abilities, he has suffered injury at the claws of a monstrous dragon. He bids you fetch some healing spring water from Dragonspit, supplying you with a bottle for the purpose.
TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_SEQ_02<tab>You fill the bottle with water from the spring. Return it to Jantellot so that he might regain his strength.

TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_SEQ_03<tab>You provide Jantellot with the spring's healing water. He explains that, while the Convictory's supplies─particularly of healing potions─are low, the water you retrieved is more effective than the strongest of potions...or so some people say.
TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_JANTELLOT_000_000<tab>Unnngh... My leg... That last dragon made quite a mess of it.

TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_JANTELLOT_000_001<tab>Had it happened to anyone else, I daresay they'd have been made a meal of. Fortunately, I'm made of sterner stuff and got away with no more than a flesh wound to show for it.

TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_JANTELLOT_000_002<tab>I'm keen to get back out there and hunt that bastard down, but I shan't be going anywhere until this leg heals up... Say, do you think you could fetch something for me?

TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_JANTELLOT_000_003<tab>The waters of Dragonspit are said to have healing properties. If I had some of that, I'd be back on my feet in no time. Take this bottle and fill it with water from that spring, would you?
TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_JANTELLOT_000_010<tab>Head up to Dragonspit and fetch me some of that renowned spring water. I can't stand to sit around here a moment longer!
TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_JANTELLOT_100_020<tab>Do you have that spring water? I need to get back out there. I'm sick of seeing those dragons strut about without a care in the realm!

TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_JANTELLOT_000_020<tab>Good, good. And not a moment too soon─I fear those dragons are starting to forget the taste of Ishgardian steel. After a few applications of this, I'll be ready to get back out there and give them a sharp reminder.
TEXT_HEAVNZ118_01767_JANTELLOT_000_021<tab>They say this stuff is better than any potion. It's just as well, given how meager our supplies have been getting lately.
